item.description:
Hey Kids,
Lets try a ride at Great Brook Farm State Park this Saturday, Nov. 17 at 11:00 am. Mellow pace, mostly easy trails depending on who shows up, plan on riding for around 2 hours. Rain/snow cancels the ride.

Here's a link to the park site with directions:

http://www.mass.gov/d...

Note: $2.00 for parking

Meet at the "lower" lot, closest to the ice cream stand (sorry, I think its closed for the season).

Hope to see you there,

Gary

Cell: 508-454-8008

I'll be the funny-looking guy with the silver T-Bird and black Santacruz Bullit.
item.name: Great Brook Farm State Park, This Saturday, Nov. 17
